mdcr:Descriptor.mdcr:Label: M/4
mdcr:Descriptor.mdcr:Explanation: This is used mostly for movies and videos that are particularly recommended for young children.

mdcr:Descriptor.mdcr:Label: M/6
mdcr:Descriptor.mdcr:Definition: Passed for viewers aged 6 and older.
mdcr:Descriptor.mdcr:Explanation: May have some mild content/foul language. This is also the lowest rating a subtitled movie can get.

mdcr:Descriptor.mdcr:Label: M/12
mdcr:Descriptor.mdcr:Definition: suitable for children aged 12 and above; children under 12 may be admitted if accompanied by an adult.
mdcr:Descriptor.mdcr:Explanation: Movies rated M/12 may contain moderate violence and some gore, moderate sex scenes or references, suicide, strong language and drug references.

mdcr:Descriptor.mdcr:Label: M/16
mdcr:Descriptor.mdcr:Definition: suitable for children aged 16 and above; children under 16 may be admitted if accompanied by an adult.
mdcr:Descriptor.mdcr:Explanation: Movies rated M/16 may contain strong violence and gore, sexual violence, aggressive language, strong sex scenes and drug use.

mdcr:Descriptor.mdcr:Label: M/18
mdcr:Descriptor.mdcr:Definition: Passed for viewers aged 18 and older.
mdcr:Descriptor.mdcr:Explanation: Children under 18 may accompany an adult but admission can be refused by the exhibitor. Movies rated M/18 may contain extreme violence and gore, strong sustained sexual violence, unsimulated sex scenes, frequent aggressive strong language and glamorized drug use.
